Positive 
result
If 2 lines (bands) appear within 15-20 mins at C (control) and T1, the person is suffering from 
P. falciparum malaria.
Positive 
result
If 2 lines (bands) appear within 15-20 mins at C (control) andT2, the person is suffering from 
P. vivax malaria.
Positive 
result
If 3 lines (bands) appear within 15-20 mins at C (control), T1 and T2, the person is suffering 
from both P. falciparum and P. vivax malaria.
Invalid 
test
